E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 9/5/1973
Subject: Mike Easler learns new position
Mike Easler has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Centerfield.
I would rate his skills as "D" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 9/5/1973
Subject: Progress of Lloyd Allen
Dear Sir,
Lloyd Allen is doing pretty good at AA Trois-Rivieres Aigles!
He has an ERA of 2.79, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
